snippet: ZELMAN--Martin. The Palm Beach Country Club expresses its profound sorrow at the passing of its esteemed member, Martin Zelman, and extends sincere sympathy to his wife Lois and his extended family. Jeffrey B. Lane, President Warren Spector, Secretary 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZELMAN--Martin. The Palm Beach Country Club expresses its profound sorrow at the passing of its esteemed member, Martin Zelman, and extends sincere sympathy to his wife Lois and his extended family. Jeffrey B. Lane, President Warren Spector, Secretary 1/3
